statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|g"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); time=$(date +%H:%M); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); transcript=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); todo_count=$([ -f "$transcript" ] && grep -c '"type":"todo"' "$transcript" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null; branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); status=''; [ -n "$branch" ] && { [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ] && status='*'; }; B='\033[38;2;30;102;245m'; G='\033[38;2;64;160;43m'; Y='\033[38;2;223;142;29m'; M='\033[38;2;136;57;239m'; C='\033[38;2;23;146;153m'; R='\033[0m'; T='\033[38;2;76;79;105m'; printf "${C}${user}${R}:${B}${cwd}${R}"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " ${G}${branch}${Y}${status}${R}"; [ -n "$remaining" ] && printf " ${M}ctx:${remaining}%%${R}"; printf " ${T}${model}${R} ${Y}${time}${R}"; [ "$todo_count" -gt 0 ] && printf " ${C}todos:${todo_count}${R}"; echo
statusLine.description: 自定义状态栏显示：user:path branch* ctx:% model time todos:N

_comments.usage: 将 statusLine 对象复制到你的 ~/.claude/settings.json
